triggerBlocks.title: Start on Green Flag
triggerBlocks.description: Starts the script when the Green Flag is tapped.

triggerBlocks.title: Start on Tap
triggerBlocks.description: Starts the script when you tap on the character.

triggerBlocks.title: Start on Bump
triggerBlocks.description: Starts the script when the character is touched by another character.

triggerBlocks.title: Start on Message
triggerBlocks.description: Starts the script whenever a message of the specified color is sent.

triggerBlocks.title: Send Message
triggerBlocks.description: Sends a message of the specified color.

motionBlocks.title: Move Right
motionBlocks.description: Moves the character a specified number of grid squares to the right.

motionBlocks.title: Move Left
motionBlocks.description: Moves the character a specified number of grid squares to the left.

motionBlocks.title: Move Up
motionBlocks.description: Moves the character a specified number of grid squares up.

motionBlocks.title: Move Down
motionBlocks.description: Moves the character a specified number of grid squares down.

motionBlocks.title: Turn Right
motionBlocks.description: Rotates the character clockwise a specified amount. Turn 12 for a full rotation.

motionBlocks.title: Turn Left
motionBlocks.description: Rotates the character counterclockwise a specified amount. Turn 12 for a full rotation.

motionBlocks.title: Hop
motionBlocks.description: Moves the character up a specified number of grid squares and then down again.

motionBlocks.title: Go Home
motionBlocks.description: Resets the character's location to its starting position. (To set a new starting position, drag the character to the location).

looksBlocks.title: Say
looksBlocks.description: Shows a specified message in a speech bubble above the character.

looksBlocks.title: Reset Size
looksBlocks.description: Returns the character to its default size.

looksBlocks.title: Hide
looksBlocks.description: Fades out the character until it is invisible.

looksBlocks.title: Show
looksBlocks.description: Fades in the character until it is fully visible.

soundBlocks.title: Play Recorded Sound
soundBlocks.description: Plays a sound recorded by the user.

controlBlocks.title: Wait
controlBlocks.description: Pauses the script for a specified amount of time (in tenths of seconds).

controlBlocks.title: Set Speed
controlBlocks.description: Changes the rate at which certain blocks are run.

controlBlocks.title: Repeat
controlBlocks.description: Runs the blocks inside a specified number of times.

endBlocks.title: End
endBlocks.description: Indicates the end of the script (but does not affect the script in any way).

endBlocks.title: Repeat Forever
endBlocks.description: Runs the script over and over.

endBlocks.title: Go to Page
endBlocks.description: Changes to the specified page of the project.
